body.name: Striking Viking Shaving Cream for Men, Unscented (5.3 Oz) Shaving Cream Mens - Sensitive Skin Shaving Cream That Helps Moisturise, Protect and Soothe the Skin
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 10% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 18 hrs 9 mins
features: Moisturizes, Protects and Soothes: A shaving cream designed for sensitive skin that combats shaving-related irritation, including burning, micro cuts, dryness, tightness, and stubble itch, leaving your skin feeling clean, fresh, and invigorated.
Easy To Use: Create a dense lather effortlessly, whether using a shaving brush or not. The creamy texture effectively softens and lifts the beard, ensuring a close and comfortable shave.
Smooth Razor Glide: The lather enables an excellent razor glide, effectively ensuring the protection of the skin against nicks and cuts.
Unscented Elegance:Indulge in the captivating Unscented experience with our Striking Viking Shaving Cream, meticulously crafted to elevate your shaving routine to new heights.
Professional-Grade Formula: Developed with precision, this shave cream boasts a professional-grade formula that caters to the needs of discerning men who appreciate quality grooming products.
Striking Viking Confidence: Trust the Striking Viking brand for an incomparable shaving experience with a cream that seamlessly blends style, functionality, and a delightful unscented fragrance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars makes my Viking soft and smooth
reviews.reviewText: I married a viking, or at least that is what I like to tell people. So when I saw this product, I thought it was fitting that I order it for him. He doesn't shave very often, and mostly just trims his beard but uses this more as a lotion. Which is fitting as it looks and smells like a lotion. It definitely moisturizes. I have noticed a difference in the softness of his facial hair and in in his skin. He uses about 3-4 pumps for his face. It does not dispense a lot at one time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall... Great aftershave.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased through Vine. This has great moisturizing properties, and is unscented making applying it to face/head enjoyable. I have a shaved bald head, and have been using this product on my head. It works great, and has limited the dryness during the cold months. I like that it comes in a pump bottle, however the product is a little thick making it a little difficult to get product "through" the pump.I have enjoyed using this product, and will look to it in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soothing after shave
reviews.reviewText: This after shave balm did a good job moisturizing and soothing my skin after my shave. I tend to get pretty bad razor burn and redness after I shave, and I have tried a number of different products to deal with it. Most do very little to relieve the redness, but this one helped soothe the skin and relieve the burn and rednessThis has the consistency of a lotion. It does take a minute to absorb into the skin, but it is worth it for an effective after shave. The only complaint I have is the bottle doesn't seem designed for this type of thick cream. It comes out with a pump head, but the hole is small so only a tiny amount comes out at a time. This would work better in a jar or squeeze tube

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and soothing
reviews.reviewText: My husband really likes this after shave balm. The balm is really soothing. It goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly. The balm leaves his face feeling moisturized and silky soft. I liked how his face felt so much that I even stole a little of it for my legs. It is unscented and doesn't cause any irritation. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing but needs a different style pump
reviews.reviewText: My husband and son have been using this after shaving and really like how it feels, especially in this dry, cold weather. Their only complaint is the style of pump it has. It really is not suited for this style of product because of the thickness. Other than that, it's a very nice balm and they are happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great stuff for a man’s beard! Makes it soft and a little shiny along with smoothing it down. It smell good too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and smoothing
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband to try because he hasn’t had much luck with aftershave balms.Pros:- unscented so it’s great for sensitive skin- moisturizing- instantly soothing- goes on smoothlyCons:- kind of thick and hard to get out of the dispenser

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great aftershave product!
reviews.reviewText: This Striking Viking After Shave Balm is the best men’s product I’ve found. It is soothing and leaves post-shave skin feeling soft and hydrated. I like the fact that it applies easily and quickly absorbs into my skin. It moisturizes without leaving a heavy residue. I also like that fact that it is unscented.
